{"id":435230237,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1609093698,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/435230237/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int cntr = 0;\n        int m = nums1.size();\n        int n = nums2.size();\n        vector<int>New;\n        for(int i = 0 , j = 0; cntr < n + m; cntr++){\n            if(j==n){\n                New.push_back(nums1[i]);i++;continue;\n            }\n            if(i==m){\n                New.push_back(nums2[j]);j++;continue;\n            }\n            if(nums1[i]>nums2[j]){\n                New.push_back(nums2[j]);j++;\n            }\n            else {\n                New.push_back(nums1[i]);i++;\n            }\n        }\n        cntr = (n + m);\n        double b=0.0;\n        if(cntr % 2){\n            b = New[cntr/2];\n            return {b};\n        }\n        else {\n            b = (New[cntr/2] + New[cntr/2 - 1])/2.0;\n            return {b};\n        }\n    }\n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
